title: Angular AppShell Options Schema
description: Generates an application shell for running a server-side version of an app.

project.description: The name of the related client app.

route.description: Route path used to produce the application shell.

appId.description: The application ID to use in withServerTransition().

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

appDir.description: The name of the application directory.

rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root module file

rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root module class.
